div.p: Nationwide Loan Consultants & Advisors, LLC, a Florida limited liability company (sometimes referred to in this Agreement as "Nationwide") and Customer (sometimes referred to in this Agreement as "Borrower," "I", "me," "my," "you," and "your") have agreed that Nationwide shall provide certain services in relation to you possibly obtaining a loan. Nationwide and Customer agree as follows:

ol.li: Nationwide represents that it is not acting as a lender or acting on behalf of any lender with respect to this Agreement. Thus, Nationwide is not affiliated with any of the lenders to which it will submit loan applications on your behalf. Nationwide utilizes its considerable resources and data pool, along with its experienced professional staff in an effort to find you the most suitable loan package(s) to fit your borrowing criteria.

Services provided by Nationwide ("Nationwide Services") consist of researching potential loans/lenders applicable to your needs, advising you on such available loan products, referring you to the lenders providing applicable loan products, and consulting with you throughout that process. Therefore, Nationwide will submit or refer you to multiple lenders in our database. Each individual lender will do its own credit check and underwriting. As such, Nationwide has no liability for the actions/decisions of any such referred lenders or whether the final loan product offered by any lender that meets the Borrower’s expectations as to terms, interest rates or lender fees. You acknowledge and agree that the responsibilities of Nationwide shall be limited to the services listed above, and as such Nationwide shall not engage in any negotiations whatsoever on your behalf and Nationwide shall have no continuing obligations, duties, responsibilities, role, part in the negotiations, or in the relationship between the lender and you, whatsoever.

I fully understand and acknowledge that the loan packages offered by the lenders located by Nationwide are also available to me without utilizing the services of Nationwide, and therefore, I could have tried to locate such packages on my own without the need to incur the Consulting Fee identified in the agreement. However, I have elected to utilize the services of Nationwide and pay the Consulting Fee as specified herein. I have elected to retain the services of Nationwide because Nationwide has experience in the consumer loan industry and has vast resources and knowledge to assist me to properly complete the application process, which will increase my chances of finding a suitable loan package(s) with the best rates and terms available for my needs

I understand that by proceeding, I am authorizing Nationwide to represent me and act on my behalf for the loan application process, in written form, electronically, verbally, or any other means in which it is required in order to obtain the best loan option available for me. I further authorize Nationwide to communicate with all lenders on my behalf, verbally or through the e-mail process. I understand that Nationwide will need to create an email on my behalf in order to communicate with various lenders and organize applications submitted on my behalf, therefore , I grant Nationwide the authority to create and access an email on my behalf.
I also grant Nationwide the authority to access my credit report and I understand that Nationwide may pull and view my credit report for up to 120 days after I execute this Agreement.

If any actions of the Borrower are necessary or appropriate in connection with the loan applications contemplated hereunder, then the Borrower shall use his/her best efforts to perform such actions in a timely manner and to cooperate with and assist Nationwide’s efforts, including but not limited to, speaking (dealing) directly with a lender, returning telephone calls, responding to communications including e-mails, verifying your identity, and furnishing all documents and information requested by Nationwide and/or a lender.

Nationwide agrees that you are never under any obligation to accept or receive a loan or a line of credit. Nationwide cannot and will not accept any loans on your behalf without your approval. Nationwide endeavors to provide you with the best options to choose from but all decisions regarding any loan offers, including closing on any of the loan options is solely your choice to make.

Nationwide does not charge an UPFRONT FEE. Nationwide works completely risk free for you. The only time a charge for services is due to Nationwide, is after you are approved by a lender and receive access to the funds, or under the circumstances set forth in paragraph (10) below. Any fees due and payable by you to Nationwide are for Nationwide Services I understand that some lenders have fees and that these fees are separate and in addition to any fees you owe Nationwide.

I agree to pay Nationwide a one-time Consulting Fee of ( %) of the total dollar amount I accept and receive from a bank or lending institution as a result of the services provided by Nationwide. I understand that this Consulting Fee is payable to Nationwide by me within 48 hours from the time I receive access to funding. I understand that I will be charged and will owe Nationwide a late fee of five (5%) percent of the Consulting Fee if Nationwide does not receive the Consulting Fee within 72 hours of the date, I receive access to funding. I understand that in such event I will also be responsible for attorney’s fees and costs incurred by Nationwide in connection with efforts to collect the Consulting Fee.

I agree not to circumvent Nationwide by applying for and/or obtaining financing from any of the lenders located by Nationwide for a period of 90 days from the date of execution of this Agreement, without notifying Nationwide and paying the consulting fee hereunder. I understand that if I do, I will be in breach of this Agreement and I will be liable to pay the Consulting Fee specified in paragraph (9) below, based on the total dollar amount of any such funding. I understand that in such event I will also be responsible for attorney’s fees and costs incurred by Nationwide in connection with efforts to collect the Consulting Fee.

I agree that the Consulting Fee due under this Agreement shall be made through an automated clearing house (“ACH”) transfer from my designated account directly to Nationwide. Accordingly, upon execution of this Agreement, I agree to deliver to Nationwide a completed One Time ACH Authorization Form, (a copy of which is attached and incorporated herein) whereby I hereby irrevocably authorize Nationwide to initiate an ACH transfer from my account to Nationwide in the amount of the fee due under this Agreement. For so long as my obligations under this Agreement remain outstanding, I agree to: (i) not revoke Nationwide authority to initiate ACH debit as hereby contemplated; (ii) not change, modify, close or otherwise affect the account; (iii) direct any lender deposit all loans contemplated herein into the account designated in the ACH Form; and (iv) be responsible for all costs, expenses, or other fees and charges incurred by Nationwide as a result of any failed or returned ACH debits, whether resulting from insufficient sums being available in the account, or otherwise. I hereby certify that I am the authorized user of this bank account designated in the ACH Form and I will not dispute the transactions contemplated hereunder with my bank, so long as the transactions correspond to the terms indicated in this Agreement.

I understand and acknowledge that as part of its service promise, Nationwide has a mandatory dispute resolution process. If I am dissatisfied with the services provided by Nationwide, I must first contact my customer service representative via e-mail or telephone and request a Dispute Resolution Form. I must then complete and submit that form via e-mail as instructed on the form. Nationwide will respond to all dispute resolution requests within two business days (weekends and legal holidays are not included) of receipt of a properly submitted Dispute Resolution Form.

I understand that I will not have to pay the Consulting Fee provided for in this Agreement for loans I obtain from lenders with which I have applied for an unsecured loan, credit card, or line of credit within the past (60) sixty days, as listed in paragraph (14) below. I further understand that I will not have to pay the Consulting Fee provided for in this Agreement for loans I obtain from lenders with which I currently have an open unsecured loan or line of credit, as listed in paragraph (15) below. Nationwide will not apply for loans on my behalf with the lenders I list in paragraphs (14) and (15) below.

I understand and agree that if any lender inquires as to whether I am working with a third party in relation to obtaining a loan, I must disclose to the lender that I am working with Nationwide. In the event of such lender inquiry, I understand and agree that I must notify Nationwide and provide the name of the lender(s) and the name of the lender’s representative to which disclosure was made

I understand and agree that Nationwide will require me to review and approve any and all information provided to my loan advisor prior to submission of any applications. I also agree that I will promptly notify Nationwide if any of the information provided later becomes inaccurate or changed for any reason. Further, I will promptly notify Nationwide if I provide any information to any prospective lender that differs from the information I provided to Nationwide or if I alter any information submitted to any lender.

I shall defend, indemnify and hold harmless Nationwide (and/or its shareholders, directors, members, managers, officers, representatives, employees, successors, licensees and assigns) from and against any and all claims, demands, losses, damages, actions, liabilities, judgments, penalties, costs and expenses (including, without limitation, attorneys 'fees and court costs, whether or not in connection with litigation) arising out of or otherwise relating to your breach of any representation or warranty hereunder and/or related to any claims arising from any negotiations or agreements with any lender

This Agreement can only be canceled after Nationwide receives written cancellation provided by me. Any such cancellation shall not relieve me from any payment or other obligations and responsibilities under paragraphs (9) and (10) above. From the date of written cancellation, Nationwide has the right to review and access any and all credit reports for verification purposes only. I agree and accept that I do not have the right to cancel this ninety-day (90-day) credit review process.

Nationwide Services are also available for commercial loans. In the event that you desire Nationwide Services regarding a commercial loan, including but not limited to merchant cash advance or accounts receivables based loans, then all terms and conditions of this Agreement shall apply to any commercial loan, including but not limited to consents, authorizations, consulting fees, warranties and representations. It may also be necessary to transmit the foregoing information to third parties in order to provide of Nationwide Services in connection with a commercial loan. You also consent to the release by any creditor or financial institution of any of the foregoing information to Nationwide and/or its representatives , successors, assigns and designees. You authorize Nationwide to obtain and/or transmit the foregoing information. You also warrant that you are authorized to act on behalf of and bind any entity for which you request that Nationwide Services be provided. You agree that you are individually responsible for payment of consulting fees regardless of whether the loan is funded to an entity.

This Agreement contains the entire agreement of the Parties, and it may only be modified by an agreement in writing signed by all Parties. This Agreement shall be construed and interpreted in accordance with the substantive laws of the State of Florida, without regard to its conflict of laws principles. This Agreement is deemed entered into in the State of Florida and for any dispute arising out of or under this Agreement, or which are related to this Agreement, venue and jurisdiction shall be exclusively in Broward County, Florida and the Parties hereby consent to venue and jurisdiction in Broward County, Florida. In connection with any litigation arising out of or under this Agreement, the prevailing party shall be entitled to recover all costs and reasonable attorney's fees including appellate and post judgment proceedings. I agree to the aforementioned terms and conditions making this a binding contract. I understand that this Agreement is bound by electronic signature. This electronic signature must be that of the actual individual applying for a loan otherwise it constitutes forgery under any and all applicable state and federal laws, statutes, rules, and regulations. The individual "signing" this document affirms that the facts stated herein are true.
